analysis.title: AI-Powered Food Analysis

coach.title: AI Health Coach
coach.description: Your personal 24/7 wellness guide. Chat with CalCoach for personalized advice, motivation, and answers to your nutrition questions.

dashboard.title: Smart Dashboard
dashboard.description: Real-time progress tracking with dynamic visual indicators. Watch your intake change from green to orange to red as you approach your daily limit.

workout.title: Workout Integration
workout.description: Seamlessly track your fitness alongside your nutrition. Create custom workout plans and track your sets, reps, and progress.

howItWorks.title: From Photo to Macros in

analysis.description: Gemini AI breaks down ingredients, estimates portions, and logs calories instantly to your dashboard.
